description:
A 22-year-old anime director and animator. She never shies away from hard work when it comes to things she loves, and she often becomes so engrossed in her work that she loses sight of her surroundings. She doesn`t trust others, believing that doing things herself is faster. Her tendency to act on her ideas immediately takes those around her by surprise. She has difficulties with communication. She vowed not to cut her hair until the storyboard for her upcoming movie was completed, leading to her current hairstyle, though she doesn`t mind it. She is in a good mood when she`s eating something delicious.
Source: Official X
name: Hirose Natsuko
